title: Singapore Banks to Phase Out OTPs for Online Logins Within 3 Months
description: Retail banking institutions in Singapore have three months to phase out the use of one-time passwords (OTPs) for authentication purposes when signing into online accounts to mitigate the risk of phishing attacks.
